User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the Manos Unidas Digital application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

googleId.description: The unique Google ID associated with the user's account.

profilePicture.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

Material.title: Material
Material.description: Represents a school supply or uniform item available for donation or exchange.

id.description: Unique identifier for the material entity.

postedBy.description: The UID of the user who posted the material. (Reference to User)

title.description: The title of the material (e.g., 'Textbook - Math Grade 9').

description.description: A detailed description of the material, including its condition.

gradeLevel.description: The grade level the material is suitable for (e.g., 'Grade 9', 'Elementary').

condition.description: The condition of the material (e.g., 'New', 'Used - Good', 'Used - Fair').

imageUrl.description: URL of the photo of the material.

solicitudes.description: The number of requests for this material.

asignadoA.description: The ID of the request to which this material was assigned.

datePosted.description: The date and time when the material was posted.

Solicitud.title: Solicitud
Solicitud.description: Represents a request made by a user for a material.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. Only the authenticated user can read/write their own document.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

definition.description: Stores material listings. Includes the userId for authorization. Anyone can read material, but only the user who posted the material can modify or delete it.

params.name: materialId
params.description: The unique identifier for the material.

definition.description: Stores requests for a material. Anyone can create a request, but only the material owner can read them.
